ground_truth: Climbing the wooden ladder leading to it, he cuts the rope securing a door and pulls it open. Michael is nearest the door. Rambo removes the blindfold. Rambo leaves, passing the footless corpse of the crucified man. At the dance show, one of the soldiers pulls on a cigarette, stands, and throws the butt at the dancing girls. A woman raises an arm to protect herself. The soldier raises his arms in triumph. Another soldier throws liquid at them. The women cower. Diaz creeps between two huts and is surprised by Rambo, who's waiting there. Rambo beckons to him. At the dance, a soldier with a can of booze climbs onto the stage with a grin on his face. He slaps one of the girls on the rump. She lurches forward. The soldiers jump and wave their arms ecstatically. Lewis runs past a hut with his weapon primed. Two guards in ponchos walk over the wooden bridge. Rambo takes cover in the timbers beneath it. The soldier on stage continues to humiliate a terrified dancing woman by pouring his can of drink over her head. Rambo wades up the stream. A soldier emerges from a hut onto a veranda. He angles a lamp above his head to illuminate them. He carries a spirit-type bottle of golden-brown booze in his hand. He swigs from the bottle and goes inside. He emerges once more. He plants his hands on his head and heads away across the sodden compound. BN sneaks up to the cage, breaks open a chain on the door, and motions the women to follow him quietly. Rambo continues upstream. It rises to meet the ground of the camp and is bordered by bushes. Yards from its end, Rambo spots a Burmese soldier pushing a young boy in front of him. Rambo ducks out of sight as they go by. The dance event descends into chaos. The soldier on stage slams one of the women to the stage floor. He picks her up and throws her over the arms of his fellows below. They begin to tear at her clothes. One trooper fights the others off and leads the girl away, keeping his comrades at arms' length. The boy is pushed into another hut, where the commander is sitting. The door of the hut remains open. The commander walks up to the boy and inspects him. The commander wears a tunic decorated with ribbons. It is open, and he wears a white vest and dog tags underneath. The commander strokes the boy's head. Rambo looks away in disgust. The door closes. Rambo emerges from hiding. He checks his watch, three minutes to two. Diaz hops over a timber fence and runs up the ladders to the volunteers' cage.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Climbing the wooden stairway leading to it, he severs the cord securing a portal and pulls it open. Michael is nearest the door. Rambo removes the blindfold. Rambo departs, passing the footless cadaver of the crucified man. At the dance exhibition, one of the troopers pulls on a cigarette, stands, and tosses the butt at the dancing girls. A woman lifts an arm to shield herself. The trooper raises his arms in victory. Another trooper hurls fluid at them. The women cower. Diaz sneaks between two shanties and is surprised by Rambo, who's waiting there. Rambo gestures to him. At the dance, a trooper with a can of booze climbs onto the platform with a grin on his face. He slaps one of the girls on the rear. She stumbles forward. The soldiers leap and wave their arms jubilantly. Lewis runs past a hut with his weapon primed. Two sentries in ponchos stroll over the wooden bridge. Rambo takes cover in the timbers beneath it. The trooper on stage continues to humiliate a frightened dancing woman by pouring his can of liquor over her head. Rambo wades up the stream. A trooper emerges from a hut onto a veranda. He angles a lamp above his head to illuminate them. He carries a spirit-type bottle of golden-brown booze in his hand. He swigs from the bottle and goes inside. He emerges once more. He plants his hands on his head and heads away across the sodden compound. BN sneaks up to the cage, breaks open a chain on the door, and motions the women to follow him quietly. Rambo continues upstream. It rises to meet the ground of the camp and is bordered by bushes. Yards from its end, Rambo spots a Burmese trooper pushing a young boy in front of him. Rambo ducks out of sight as they go by. The dance event descends into chaos. The trooper on stage slams one of the women to the stage floor. He picks her up and throws her over the arms of his fellows below. They begin to tear at her garments. One trooper fights the others off and leads the girl away, keeping his comrades at arms' length. The boy is pushed into another hut, where the commander is sitting. The door of the hut remains open. The commander walks up to the boy and inspects him. The commander wears a tunic decorated with ribbons. It is open, and he wears a white vest and dog tags underneath. The commander strokes the boy's head. Rambo looks away in disgust. The door closes. Rambo emerges from hiding. He checks his chronometer, three minutes to two. Diaz hops over a timber barricade and runs up the ladders to the volunteers' cage.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: The wooden ladder leading to it was climbed by him, and the rope securing a door was cut by him before it was pulled open. The door is nearest to Michael. The blindfold is removed by Rambo. The footless corpse of the crucified man is passed by Rambo as he leaves. At the dance show, a cigarette is pulled on by one of the soldiers, who stands and throws the butt at the dancing girls. An arm is raised by a woman to protect herself. His arms are raised in triumph by the soldier. Liquid is thrown at them by another soldier. The women cower. Rambo surprises Diaz, who's creeping between two huts, by waiting there. Diaz is beckoned by Rambo. At the dance, a can of booze is held by a soldier who climbs onto the stage with a grin on his face. One of the girls is slapped on the rump by him. She lurches forward. The arms of the soldiers are jumped and waved ecstatically. A hut is run past by Lewis with his weapon primed. A wooden bridge is walked over by two guards in ponchos. Cover is taken in the timbers beneath it by Rambo. A terrified dancing woman is humiliated by the soldier on stage who continues to pour his can of drink over her head. The stream is waded up by Rambo. A hut is emerged from by a soldier onto a veranda. A lamp is angled above his head to illuminate them. A spirit-type bottle of golden-brown booze is carried in his hand. He swigs from the bottle and goes inside. Once more, he emerges. His hands are planted on his head by him, and he heads away across the sodden compound. The cage is sneaked up to by BN, who breaks open a chain on the door and motions for the women to follow him quietly. Upstream is continued by Rambo. The camp is met by it as it rises and is bordered by bushes. Yards from its end, a Burmese soldier pushing a young boy in front of him is spotted by Rambo. Rambo ducks out of sight as they go by. Chaos descends into the dance event. One of the women is slammed to the stage floor by the soldier on stage. She is picked up and thrown over the arms of his fellows below by him. Her clothes begin to be torn at by them. The others are fought off by one trooper, who leads the girl away, keeping his comrades at arm's length. The boy is pushed into another hut, where the commander is sitting. The door of the hut remains open. The boy is walked up to by the commander, who inspects him. A tunic decorated with ribbons is worn by the commander. It is open, and a white vest and dog tags are worn underneath by him. The boy's head is stroked by the commander. Disgust causes Rambo to look away. The door closes. Hiding is emerged from by Rambo. His watch is checked by him, showing three minutes to two. A timber fence is hopped over by Diaz, who then runs up the ladders to the volunteers' cage.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Climbing the wooden ladder, he cuts the rope and opens the door. Michael is closest. Rambo removes the blindfold, leaves, and passes the footless corpse. At the dance show, a soldier smokes, stands, and throws the cigarette at the dancers. A woman shields herself. Another soldier throws liquid. The women cower. Diaz sneaks between huts and finds Rambo waiting. At the dance, a soldier grins and climbs on stage, slapping a dancer. Soldiers cheer wildly. Lewis runs past a hut ready to fire. Two guards cross a wooden bridge. Rambo hides beneath. A soldier humiliates a woman by pouring a drink over her. Rambo wades upstream. A soldier exits a hut with a bottle, drinks, and goes back inside before leaving across the compound. BN opens the cage and quietly frees the women. Rambo continues upstream, hiding when he spots a soldier with a young boy. The dance descends into chaos. A soldier slams a woman and throws her to his comrades, who tear at her clothes. One trooper rescues her. The boy is taken to the commander, who inspects him and strokes his head. Rambo looks away in disgust. The door closes, and Rambo checks his watch: three minutes to two. Diaz jumps a fence and heads to the volunteers' cage.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Climbing the wooden ladder, he cuts the rope and pulls open the door. Michael is nearest. Rambo removes the blindfold and leaves past a crucified corpse. At the dance show, a soldier throws a cigarette at the dancers; a woman shields herself. Another soldier throws liquid. The women cower. Diaz, creeping between huts, is surprised by waiting Rambo, who beckons him. At the dance, a soldier with booze climbs on stage and slaps a dancer. The soldiers cheer. Lewis runs with his primed weapon. Two guards in ponchos cross a bridge; Rambo hides beneath. The soldier humiliates a woman, pouring drink over her. Rambo wades upstream. A soldier emerges onto a veranda, swigs booze, and goes inside. He exits, hands on head, and leaves. BN breaks a chain on the cage door and motions women to follow quietly. Rambo spots a soldier pushing a boy and ducks out of sight. Chaos ensues at the dance. The soldier slams a woman down; others tear at her clothes. A trooper saves her, fending off his comrades. The boy is pushed into a hut where the commander inspects him, wearing an open tunic with ribbons and dog tags. The commander strokes the boy's head. Rambo looks away in disgust. The door closes. Rambo checks his watch; it's three minutes to two. Diaz leaps a fence and runs to the volunteers' cage.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
Carefully climbing the sturdy wooden ladder that leads to the entrance, he cautiously cuts the rope that is securing the door, pulling it open with precision. Michael is situated closest to the door. Rambo proceeds to remove the blindfold from his own eyes. After doing so, Rambo leaves the area, passing by the macabre sight of the footless corpse of the crucified man without pausing. Meanwhile, at the vibrant dance show, one of the soldiers nonchalantly pulls on a cigarette. He then stands up and throws the butt callously towards the dancing girls. Reacting swiftly, a woman raises an arm to shield and protect herself from potential harm. The soldier, with a sense of triumph, raises his arms joyfully into the air. Following his lead, another soldier carelessly throws liquid at the women, causing them to cower in fright. 

Elsewhere, Diaz stealthily creeps between two closely placed huts only to be taken by surprise when he encounters Rambo, who is already waiting there. With a gesture, Rambo beckons him forward. Back at the chaotic dance, a soldier holding a can of booze eagerly climbs onto the stage, a wide grin spreading across his face. He audaciously slaps one of the girls on her rump, causing her to lurch forward unexpectedly. This action causes the soldiers to jump and wave their arms ecstatically, clearly enjoying the disorder. Meanwhile, Lewis runs swiftly past a nearby hut, his weapon at the ready and primed for use. At the same time, two guards dressed in ponchos casually walk over the wooden bridge. Taking advantage of the situation, Rambo takes cover among the timbers situated beneath it. 

On stage, the soldier continues his despicable act of humiliating a terrified dancing woman by cruelly pouring his can of drink over her head. Undeterred, Rambo wades up the stream, making his way forward. A soldier soon emerges from a hut and steps onto a veranda. He angles a lamp strategically above his head to illuminate the surroundings. In his hand, he carries a spirit-type bottle filled with golden-brown booze. He takes a swig from the bottle and retreats back inside briefly, only to emerge once more. He plants his hands firmly on his head and then heads away, navigating across the sodden, muddy compound. 

Meanwhile, BN stealthily sneaks up to the cage, breaks open a chain securing the door, and gestures for the women to follow him silently and quietly. Rambo unwaveringly continues his path upstream. As the stream rises to meet the ground of the camp, it is bordered by dense bushes on either side. Just yards from its end, Rambo keenly spots a Burmese soldier pushing a young boy ahead in front of him. Quickly, Rambo ducks out of sight as they pass by. Meanwhile, the dance event further descends into chaos. The soldier on stage forcefully slams one of the women down onto the stage floor. He then picks her up and cruelly throws her over the arms of his fellow soldiers below. They begin to tear at her clothes aggressively. One trooper, however, fights the others off and leads the girl away, ensuring his comrades remain at arm's length. 

Nearby, the boy is pushed into another hut, where the commander is sitting and waiting. The door of the hut remains open. The commander approaches the boy, inspecting him closely. His tunic, decorated with various ribbons, is worn open, revealing a white vest and dog tags underneath. The commander strokes the boy's head in a disturbing manner. Rambo, filled with disgust, looks away. The door then closes. Emerging from hiding, Rambo checks his watch; it reads three minutes to two. At this point, Diaz, with agility, hops over a timber fence and makes a run towards the ladders leading to the volunteers' cage.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
With great care and attention, he gingerly ascends the sturdy wooden ladder that provides access to the entrance. He then meticulously cuts the rope that is securely tying the door shut, pulling it open with calculated precision. Michael is positioned closest to this entrance. Rambo proceeds to remove the blindfold that covers his own eyes. Once he has done this, Rambo leaves the immediate vicinity, walking past the grim and unsettling sight of the footless corpse of the crucified man without breaking his stride or showing any signs of hesitation. Meanwhile, at the lively and colorful dance show, one of the soldiers casually smokes a cigarette with a detached air. He then stands up with a certain indifference and tosses the cigarette butt carelessly in the direction of the dancing girls. Responding quickly, a woman instinctively raises an arm to shield and protect herself from any potential harm. The soldier, filled with a sense of triumph and satisfaction, joyfully raises his arms into the air. Following his example, another soldier recklessly throws liquid at the women, causing them to shrink back in terror.

In another part of the scene, Diaz stealthily maneuvers between two closely situated huts, only to be taken by surprise when he encounters Rambo, who is already there, waiting for him. With a quick gesture, Rambo beckons him to come forward. Returning to the tumultuous dance show, a soldier with a can of booze eagerly climbs onto the stage, a broad grin spreading across his face. He brazenly slaps one of the girls on her backside, causing her to lurch forward unexpectedly. This action incites the soldiers to leap and wave their arms exuberantly, clearly reveling in the chaos and disorder they have created. Meanwhile, Lewis dashes past a nearby hut, his weapon prepared and ready for action. Concurrently, two guards clad in ponchos nonchalantly stroll over the wooden bridge. Seizing the opportunity provided by this distraction, Rambo takes cover among the timbers located beneath the bridge.

Back on stage, the soldier persists in his vile act of humiliating a terrified dancing woman by cruelly pouring his drink over her head. Undeterred by the chaos around him, Rambo continues to wade up the stream, steadily advancing forward. Soon, a soldier emerges from a hut and steps onto a veranda. He strategically angles a lamp above his head to cast light on the surroundings. In his other hand, he carries a spirit-type bottle filled with golden-brown booze. After taking a swig from the bottle, he retreats back inside the hut briefly, only to reemerge. He places his hands firmly on his head and then makes his way across the wet, muddy compound.

Simultaneously, BN stealthily approaches the cage, expertly breaking open the chain that secures the door, and gestures for the women to follow him silently into the night. Rambo, unwavering in his resolve, continues his journey upstream. As the stream rises to merge with the ground of the camp, it is flanked by thick, dense bushes on either side. Just a few yards from its terminus, Rambo keenly spots a Burmese soldier pushing a young boy ahead of him. Swiftly, Rambo ducks out of view as they pass by. Meanwhile, the dance event further descends into chaos. The soldier on stage forcibly slams one of the women down onto the stage floor. He then picks her up and ruthlessly throws her over to his fellow soldiers below. They begin to aggressively tear at her clothing. However, one trooper intervenes, fighting the others off and leading the girl away, ensuring that the rest keep their distance.

Nearby, the boy is pushed into another hut where the commander is already seated and waiting. The hut's door remains open. The commander approaches the boy, inspecting him closely. His tunic, decorated with various ribbons, hangs open, revealing a white vest and dog tags beneath. The commander strokes the boy’s head in a disturbingly affectionate manner. Rambo, filled with disgust at the sight, looks away. The door then closes ominously. Emerging from his hiding spot, Rambo checks his watch; the time reads three minutes to two. At this moment, Diaz, with agility and determination, leaps over a timber fence and dashes towards the ladders leading to the volunteers' cage.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Navigating the wooden ladder with careful steps, he ascends to reach the platform above, where he deftly cuts through the rope securing the door before pulling it open with a firm tug. Michael, standing closest to the doorway, becomes visible. Rambo swiftly removes the blindfold from his eyes, allowing daylight to flood in. Without hesitation, Rambo exits the area, his eyes lingering briefly on the grotesque sight of the crucified man, whose corpse remains footless as a grim testament to past violence. Transitioning to the dance show, a soldier casually draws on a cigarette, holding it between his fingers as he stands and flicks the burning butt toward the group of dancing girls, causing one woman to instinctively lift her arm in a vain attempt to shield herself. The soldier's arms shoot upward in an exaggerated gesture of triumph, while another soldier, intent on further chaos, hurls liquid at the girls, prompting them to cower in fear. Meanwhile, Diaz maneuvers stealthily between two huts, his intentions interrupted as Rambo emerges silently from the shadows, an unspoken signal passing between them with a mere gesture. Back at the dance, a soldier clutching a can of booze approaches the stage, his face split into a wide grin as he mounts it, then lands a sharp slap on one girl's rump, propelling her forward. The soldiers erupt into ecstatic jumps, their arms waving maniacally in the air. With determined strides, Lewis rushes past a hut, his weapon at the ready, while two guards clad in ponchos make their way across the wooden bridge. Rambo, aware of the danger, conceals himself amidst the timbers beneath the bridge. On the stage, the soldier continues to degrade a terrified woman by tipping his can and allowing the liquid within to cascade over her head, furthering her humiliation. Concurrently, Rambo wades steadily upstream, water lapping against him. A soldier steps onto a veranda, angling a lamp above to cast light over the scene, a spirit-type bottle containing golden-brown booze clutched tightly in his grip. He takes a hearty swig before retreating inside, then reemerges, both hands now resting atop his head as he moves across the rain-soaked compound. BN edges toward the cage, skillfully snapping a chain on the door and signaling for the women to follow him quietly into freedom. Persistently advancing upstream, Rambo notes how it aligns with the camp's ground level, the edges fringed with bushes. Just before the stream meets its terminus, Rambo spots a Burmese soldier, who is aggressively marching a young boy ahead of him. Rambo ducks swiftly out of view, allowing them to pass unnoticed. The dance event spirals into turmoil as the soldier on stage violently thrusts one of the women down onto the boards, then roughly hauls her up, tossing her into the waiting arms of those below, where they begin to tear at her clothing. One soldier, breaking ranks, fights off the others and leads the girl away, maintaining a defensive perimeter to keep his peers at bay. The young boy is shoved into another hut, where the commander is seated, the door left ajar as if inviting further scrutiny. The commander, clad in a tunic adorned with ribbons and open to reveal a white vest and dog tags beneath, approaches the boy to conduct a meticulous inspection, his hand grazing over the boy's head in a gesture that belies the sinister intent. Witnessing this, Rambo averts his gaze in revulsion, the door swinging shut to seal the encounter. Emerging from his cover, Rambo checks his watch, noting that mere minutes remain until two o'clock. Meanwhile, Diaz vaults over a timber fence, his movements fluid and purposeful, as he ascends the ladder leading to the volunteers' cage, his objective clearly in sight.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Rambo climbs the wooden ladder, cuts the rope securing the door, and opens it, revealing Michael nearby as he removes his blindfold. Rambo leaves, passing a crucified corpse, while at the dance show, soldiers exhibit their power by throwing a cigarette butt and liquid at the dancers, causing them to cower. Diaz is surprised by Rambo while sneaking between huts, and Rambo discreetly signals him. Meanwhile, a soldier humiliates a dancer by slapping her and pouring liquor on her as others cheer. Lewis navigates past huts, weapon ready, while Rambo hides beneath a bridge as guards cross it. Despite the chaos at the dance, Rambo advances upstream, remaining hidden as a soldier passes with a boy. BN stealthily opens a cage, freeing the women inside. The dance event turns violent as a soldier attacks a woman, but another rescues her. The boy is taken to the commander, who inspects him. Disgusted, Rambo turns away as the door closes. He checks his watch, noting three minutes to two, while Diaz approaches the volunteers' cage by scaling fences and ladders.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Climbing the wooden ladder leading to it, he cuts the rope securing a door, a common practice for maintaining secrecy in makeshift camps, and pulls it open. Michael is nearest the door, which creaks on its rusty hinges, a testament to the neglect apparent in such temporary hideouts. Rambo, the legendary figure known for his resilience and combat skills, removes the blindfold. Rambo leaves, passing the footless corpse of the crucified man, a brutal display that serves as a grim warning to others. At the dance show, which takes place in a war-torn village where entertainment is scarce and often forced, one of the soldiers pulls on a cigarette, stands, and throws the butt at the dancing girls. A woman raises an arm to protect herself from the burning ash. The soldier, intoxicated by power and alcohol, raises his arms in triumph. Another soldier, emboldened by the first's actions, throws liquid at them. The women cower, aware of the dire consequences of protest. Diaz, a former soldier turned rebel with a deep-seated vendetta against the regime, creeps between two huts and is surprised by Rambo, who's waiting there with his signature stoic patience. Rambo beckons to him with a silent command. At the dance, a soldier with a can of booze, likely stolen from local villagers, climbs onto the stage with a grin on his face. He slaps one of the girls on the rump, degrading her dignity. She lurches forward, struggling to maintain balance. The soldiers jump and wave their arms ecstatically, reveling in their domination. Lewis runs past a hut with his weapon primed, aware of the imminent danger that could arise at any moment. Two guards in ponchos, probably trying to shield themselves from frequent tropical downpours, walk over the wooden bridge. Rambo takes cover in the timbers beneath it, leveraging his extensive survival training. The soldier on stage continues to humiliate a terrified dancing woman by pouring his can of drink over her head, an act of supreme cruelty. Rambo wades up the stream, moving silently as he learned in guerrilla warfare. A soldier emerges from a hut onto a veranda. He angles a lamp above his head to illuminate them, a tactic used to assert control over his surroundings. He carries a spirit-type bottle of golden-brown booze in his hand, indicative of contraband most likely obtained through illegal means. He swigs from the bottle and goes inside. He emerges once more, visibly more inebriated. He plants his hands on his head, a gesture of frustration, and heads away across the sodden compound. BN, a loyal ally in the resistance, sneaks up to the cage, breaks open a chain on the door with deft precision, and motions the women to follow him quietly. Rambo continues upstream, knowing that every quiet step could be his last if detected. It rises to meet the ground of the camp and is bordered by bushes, creating a natural boundary that offers cover. Yards from its end, Rambo spots a Burmese soldier, indicative of the region's ongoing conflict, pushing a young boy in front of him. Rambo ducks out of sight as they go by, his heart heavy with the knowledge of the boy's probable fate. The dance event descends into chaos, mirroring the turmoil of the region. The soldier on stage slams one of the women to the stage floor in a violent outburst. He picks her up and throws her over the arms of his fellows below, who begin to tear at her clothes in a savage display. One trooper fights the others off and leads the girl away, keeping his comrades at arms' length, perhaps hinting at a sliver of decency or ulterior motives. The boy is pushed into another hut, where the commander, a key figure enforcing the oppressive regime, is sitting. The door of the hut remains open, an intentional act to flaunt power and control. The commander walks up to the boy and inspects him with a cold detachment. The commander wears a tunic decorated with ribbons, symbols of authority and past conquests. It is open, and he wears a white vest and dog tags underneath, identifiers of rank and service. The commander strokes the boy's head, an unsettling gesture of false compassion. Rambo looks away in disgust, fighting the urge to intervene prematurely. The door closes with a finality that seals the boy's fate. Rambo emerges from hiding, timing his movements with military precision. He checks his watch, three minutes to two, knowing that every second counts in their mission. Diaz, fueled by a mix of fear and determination, hops over a timber fence and runs up the ladders to the volunteers' cage, driven by the urgency of their shared goal.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. Rambo ducks out of sight as they go by. The dance event descends into chaos. The soldier on stage slams one of the women to the stage floor. He picks her up and throws her over the arms of his fellows below. They begin to tear at her clothes. One trooper fights the others off and leads the girl away keeping his comrades at arms' length. The boy is pushed into another hut where the commander is sitting. The door of the hut remains open. The commander walks up to the boy and inspects him. The commander wears a tunic decorated with ribbons It is open and he wears a white vest and dog tags underneath. The commander strokes the boy's head. Rambo looks away in disgust. The door closes. Rambo emerges from hiding He checks his watch. three minutes to two. Diaz hops over a timber fence and runs up the ladders to the volunteers' cage.

test_cases.description: Climbing the wooden ladder leading to it he cuts the rope securing a door and pulls it open. Michael is nearest the door Rambo removes the blindfold. Rambo leaves passing the footless corpse of the crucified man. At the dance show one of the soldiers pulls on a cigarette stands and throws the butt at the dancing girls. A woman raises an arm to protect herself. The soldier raises his arms in triumph. Another soldier throws liquid at them. The women cower. Diaz creeps between two huts and is surprised by Rambo who is waiting there. Rambo beckons to him. At the dance a soldier with a can of booze climbs onto the stage with a grin on his face. He slaps one of the girls on the rump She lurches forward. The soldiers jump and wave their arms ecstatically. Lewis runs past a hut with his weapon primed. Two guards in ponchos walk over the wooden bridge. Rambo takes cover in the timbers beneath it. The soldier on stage continues to humiliate a terrified dancing woman by pouring his can of drink over her head. Rambo wades up the stream. A soldier emerges from a hut onto a veranda. He angles a lamp above his head to illuminate them. He carries a spirittype bottle of goldenbrown booze in his hand He swigs from the bottle and goes inside. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. He emerges once more. He plants his hands on his head and heads away across the sodden compound. BN sneaks up to the cage breaks open a chain on the door and motions the women to follow him quietly. Rambo continues upstream. It rises to meet the ground of the camp and is bordered by bushes Yards from its end. Rambo spots a Burmese soldier pushing a young boy in front of him. Rambo ducks out of sight as they go by. The dance event descends into chaos. The soldier on stage slams one of the women to the stage floor. He picks her up and throws her over the arms of his fellows below. They begin to tear at her clothes. One trooper fights the others off and leads the girl away keeping his comrades at arms' length. The boy is pushed into another hut where the commander is sitting. The door of the hut remains open. The commander walks up to the boy and inspects him. The commander wears a tunic decorated with ribbons It is open and he wears a white vest and dog tags underneath. The commander strokes the boy's head. Rambo looks away in disgust. The door closes. Rambo emerges from hiding He checks his watch. three minutes to two. Diaz hops over a timber fence and runs up the ladders to the volunteers' cage.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Ascending the metallic scaffold guiding to it, she slices the chain fastening a window and pushes it ajar. Sarah is closest to the window. Morgan removes the hood. Morgan departs, bypassing the armless effigy of the bound creature. At the painting exhibition, one of the villagers tugs on a whistle, rises, and flicks the cap at the dancing penguins. A child lifts a stick to defend himself. The villager lifts his legs in victory. Another villager hurls confetti at them. The penguins huddle. Hector slips between two barns and is startled by Morgan, who's lurking there. Morgan gestures to her. At the concert, a villager with a basket of pastry climbs onto the platform with a smirk on his face. He taps one of the penguins on the beak. It tumbles backward. The villagers leap and flap their legs gleefully. Walter jogs past a barn with his flashlight ready. Two guards in top hats stroll over the metal bridge. Morgan hides within the beams beneath it. The villager on stage continues to demean a frightened hopping penguin by emptying his basket of sweets over its wing. Morgan trudges through the marsh. A villager appears from a barn onto a deck. He tilts a lantern above his feet to expose them. He grips a soda-like thermos of emerald-green juice in his pocket. He sips from the thermos and steps inside. He appears once again. He rests his elbows on his knees and strolls away across the dusty meadow. AJ sneaks up to the pen, snaps open a latch on the window, and signals the penguins to trail him quietly. Morgan proceeds downstream. It ascends to greet the border of the village and is flanked by flowers. Steps from its conclusion, Morgan notices an Argentinian villager pulling a small dog in front of her. Morgan crouches out of view as they pass. The concert spirals into pandemonium. The villager on stage hurls one of the penguins to the platform ground. He hoists it up and drops it over the legs of his companions below. They start to claw at its feathers. One medic fends the others off and guides the penguin away, maintaining his colleagues at distance. The dog is nudged into another barn, where the leader is lounging. The window of the barn stays ajar. The leader strolls up to the dog and examines it. The leader wears a blazer adorned with badges. It is ajar, and he wears a blue shirt and name tags beneath. The leader pats the dog's back. Morgan gazes away in horror. The window shuts. Morgan steps out from concealment. He glances at his compass, five minutes to nine. Hector vaults over a stone wall and jogs up the scaffolds to the companions' pen.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Rambo cuts a rope and opens a door, leaving past a crucified man's corpse. At a chaotic dance show, soldiers harass dancers. Rambo encounters Diaz between huts and signals him. As soldiers continue their abuse, Lewis runs with a weapon while Rambo hides beneath a bridge. A soldier humiliates a dancer by pouring alcohol over her. Rambo wades upstream, avoiding detection by a soldier pushing a boy. Amidst the show's chaos, a woman is assaulted, but one trooper rescues her. The boy is taken to a commander. Rambo turns away in disgust, checking his watch. Diaz reaches the volunteers' cage.
